channel.title: Need Help With mySQL

item.title: Need Help With mySQL
item.description:
@564654 wrote:

Ok, the server connects to the forums mysql database and gets the password for the player, but I cant figure out how to get it to retrieve the usergroup.

I tried:

ResultSet group2 = myStmt.executeQuery("SELECT * FROM ibf_members WHERE mgroup = '"+c.playerName+"'"); while(group2.next()) { String groupp2 = group2.getString("usergroupid"); int mgroup = Integer.parseInt(groupp2); System.out.println("Group: " + mgroup); }
But I get an error:

Data truncation: Data truncated for column 'mgroup' at row 1

The field is mgroup and the type is smallint(3)

The table is ibf_members

Obvisouly this is for someone good at mysql.

Read full topic
